ModMetaData.name: Tales from the RimWorld
ModMetaData.author: adhikasp
ModMetaData.description:
An AI author who weaves your colony's struggles into an unfolding narrative.
Transform RimWorld from a "things happen to you" simulation into a personalized narrative experience where an AI author crafts a story specifically for YOUR colony.
Features: • AI-generated flavor text for vanilla events • Choice dilemmas with meaningful consequences • Persistent story journal tracking your colony's saga • Customizable LLM settings via OpenRouter API
Select "The Narrator" as your storyteller to begin your story.
